thread.title: Dow dives 2 percent as China-U.S. trade spat intensifies

title: Dow dives 2 percent as China-U.S. trade spat intensifies
text:
Dow dives 2 percent as China-U.S. trade spat intensifies 3:35pm BST - 00:41 
The Dow Jones Industrial Average sank more than 2 percent at the open on Wednesday as big U.S. manufacturers, grain merchants and chipmakers bore the brunt of a deepening trade conflict between China and the United States. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
